Stimuli Wide (NAND): John doubts Mary knows Spanish or French. He thinks she can only speak one.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John doubts Mary knows Spanish or French. He thinks she can only speak English.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Mary doubts that John watches movies or television shows. She thinks he only watches one.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Mary doubts that John watches movies or television shows. She thinks he prefers to read.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John went on holiday without his mother or his father. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John went on holiday without his mother or his father. It's the first time he travels by himself.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Peter told me he needed to travel light. To judge by the small size of his bag, he was travelling without his computer or his movie camera.  I wonder which of the two he decided to give up.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Peter told me he needed to travel light. To judge by the small size of his bag, he was travelling without his computer or his movie camera.  I am sure he was a lot happier without electronic devices.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Trevor went to the store without his wallet or jacket. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Trevor went to the store without his wallet or jacket. He had to call his friend to bring them.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John rarely visits his sister or his mother. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John rarely visits his sister or his mother. He says that they make him uncomfortable.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John rarely goes to the grocery story or the post office. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John rarely goes to the grocery story or the post office. He doesn’t really leave his house.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): My grandmother made these cookies without rum or cinnamon. I can’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): My grandmother made these cookies without rum or cinnamon. Instead of those ingredients she added homemade brandy.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Jim said he wants to eat less junk food. I guess that's why he came back from the grocery store without cake or soda. I forget which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Jim said he wants to eat less junk food. I guess that's why he came back from the grocery store without cake or soda. He's sworn off both.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): If I remember correctly, Mary doesn’t play softball or soccer. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): If I remember correctly, Mary doesn’t play softball or soccer. She doesn’t play any ball sports.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Mary failed the Spanish test. She didn’t study the vocabulary words or the grammar. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Mary failed the Spanish test. She didn’t study the vocabulary words or the grammar. She thought she was prepared enough.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Jamie doesn’t like trees or flowers. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Jamie doesn’t like trees or flowers. She doesn’t like nature in general.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): The man spend the last hour without eating or drinking. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): The man spend the last hour without eating or drinking. He forgets when he is at work.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Mary doubts that Paul read The Brothers Karamazov or Anna Karenina. She thinks he had time for only one of them.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Mary doubts that Paul read The Brothers Karamazov or Anna Karenina. She thinks he never reads Russian literature.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Mary doesn’t like cats or dogs. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Mary doesn’t like cats or dogs. She had traumatizing experiences with both.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John is upset. Clearly, he didn’t pass the semantics or the syntax exam.  I wonder which it was.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John is upset. Clearly, he didn’t pass the semantics or the syntax exam.  And it wouldn’t be the first time he failed those classes.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John is annoyed. Mary showed up to his birthday party without a present or a card. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John is annoyed. Mary showed up to his birthday party without a present or a card. She forgot them both at home.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): It seems John has lived here for years without medical or house insurance. I don’t remember which one.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): It seems John has lived here for years without medical or house insurance. Only now has it occurred to him that he needs both of them.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Steve doubts that Chloe likes cooking or baking. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Steve doubts that Chloe likes cooking or baking. He knows she likes to eat at restaurants.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): If I remember correctly, John doesn’t drink orange juice or apple juice. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): If I remember correctly, John doesn’t drink orange juice or apple juice. He doesn’t drink any type of juice.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John didn’t get the job. He didn’t bring his resume or a list of references. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John didn’t get the job. He didn’t bring his resume or a list of references. He left them both at home.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Few people are able to recite the national anthem or the pledge of allegiance. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Few people are able to recite the national anthem or the pledge of allegiance. Both are very hard to remember.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): It’s cold in this house. I bet you, John didn’t close the window or the back door.  I wonder which one of those two we’ll find open.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): It’s cold in this house. I bet you, John didn’t close the window or the back door.  Look, just as I said, both of them are wide open!

Stimuli Wide (NAND): If I remember correctly, Annie doesn’t like chocolate or pie. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): If I remember correctly, Annie doesn’t like chocolate or pie. She dislikes all types of dessert.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Steve did not remember to wear his hat or jacket when it is cold outside.  I wonder which he forgot to wear.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Steve did not remember to wear his hat or jacket when it is cold outside.  He did not think it was cold enough.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Amy came back from the mall without buying a sweater or perfume I'm not sure which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Amy came back from the mall without buying a sweater or perfume She said she couldn't find anything she liked there.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Kate used to live without coffee or chocolate. I don't remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Kate used to live without coffee or chocolate. Now she cannot imagine her life without them.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Mary is sad. She left the restaurant without a sandwich or a cake. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Mary is sad. She left the restaurant without a sandwich or a cake. They were out of both.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Mary rarely speaks German or French. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Mary rarely speaks German or French. She usually only speaks English.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): The smoke alarm went off. I bet John didn’t open the window or the door. I wonder which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): The smoke alarm went off. I bet John didn’t open the window or the door. Look, both the window and the door are still closed.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John made it through all of college without buying coffee or bread. I forget which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John made it through all of college without buying coffee or bread. He said they were both a waste of money.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): If I remember correctly, John doesn’t drink wine or beer.  I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): If I remember correctly, John doesn’t drink wine or beer.  The doctor has forbidden him alcohol.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Apparently, few people are able to recite back a sequence of twelve letters or twelve numbers. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Apparently, few people are able to recite back a sequence of twelve letters or twelve numbers. The limit is usually ten.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): I remember there was a family conflict. Mary didn’t speak with her mother or her sister. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): I remember there was a family conflict. Mary didn’t speak with her mother or her sister. She was only talking with her father after that.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): John doubts that Sue played football or tennis. He thinks she focused on one of the two.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): John doubts that Sue played football or tennis. He thinks she never did any ball sports.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): If I remember correctly, Mary didn’t invite John or Suzi to her birthday party. I don’t know which of them.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): If I remember correctly, Mary didn’t invite John or Suzi to her birthday party. She’s upset with both of them and doesn’t want to see them.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Jane is worried. She got to the airport without her passport or her credit card. I don't remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Jane is worried. She got to the airport without her passport or her credit card. She forgot all her personal stuff in the cab to the airport!

Stimuli Wide (NAND): When he was little, John would rarely sleep with his mother or his father. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): When he was little, John would rarely sleep with his mother or his father. He always preferred to sleep alone.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Jamie is happy. She left being pulled over without a ticket for speeding or a ticket for a broken tail light. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Jamie is happy. She left being pulled over without a ticket for speeding or a ticket for a broken tail light. She’s happy she doesn’t have any tickets to pay.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Few people took the appetizer or the dessert. I don’t remember which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Few people took the appetizer or the dessert. The main dish was already expensive.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Barry rarely plays soccer or baseball. I'm not sure which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Barry rarely plays soccer or baseball. He usually prefers playing tennis.

Stimuli Wide (NAND): Few people chose to take Calculus or Statistics. I don’t know which.
Stimuli Narrow (NOR): Few people chose to take Calculus or Statistics. Both of those classes are very unpopular.
